statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule;
SELECT scheduled_by, maintenance_date, vehicle_id FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT technician_id, maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 101 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, technician_id FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY vehicle_id, maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT technician_id, scheduled_by FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type LIKE '%Inspection%' ORDER BY technician_id;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance_records, MAX(maintenance_date) AS latest_maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_maintenance_records DESC, latest_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleSchedule WHERE service_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT service_date, service_type FROM VehicleSchedule ORDER BY service_date ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_date, service_type FROM VehicleSchedule WHERE vehicle_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM ServiceHistory WHERE service_description LIKE '%brake%';
SELECT service_date, vehicle_id, service_type FROM VehicleSchedule WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM VehicleSchedule WHERE service_date = '2022-09-15' AND service_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT service_date, COUNT(vehicle_id) AS total_vehicles FROM VehicleSchedule GROUP BY service_date;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_type FROM VehicleSchedule ORDER BY service_type DESC, vehicle_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleSchedule INNER JOIN ServiceHistory ON VehicleSchedule.vehicle_id = ServiceHistory.vehicle_id WHERE VehicleSchedule.service_date > '2022-09-01';
SELECT service_id, service_description FROM ServiceHistory WHERE service_description LIKE '%engine%' ORDER BY service_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM service_schedules;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_date FROM service_schedules WHERE service_type='Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM service_schedules WHERE mechanic_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_type FROM service_schedules WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT mechanic_id FROM service_schedules ORDER BY mechanic_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM service_schedules WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT schedule_id, vehicle_id, service_date FROM service_schedules WHERE service_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM service_schedules ORDER BY service_date ASC, vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT mechanic_id, COUNT(schedule_id) AS total_schedules FROM service_schedules GROUP BY mechanic_id ORDER BY total_schedules DESC;
SELECT * FROM service_schedules WHERE vehicle_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001');
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT id, make, model, year FROM Vehicle ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT make, COUNT(*) as total_vehicles FROM Vehicle GROUP BY make;
SELECT Vehicle.make, COUNT(*) as total_scheduled_services FROM Vehicle JOIN ServiceSchedule ON Vehicle.id = ServiceSchedule.vehicle_id GROUP BY Vehicle.make;
SELECT MaintenanceLog.id, MaintenanceLog.notes, ServiceSchedule.schedule_date FROM MaintenanceLog JOIN ServiceSchedule ON MaintenanceLog.service_schedule_id = ServiceSchedule.id;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT make, model FROM Vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota' ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle JOIN ServiceSchedule ON Vehicle.id = ServiceSchedule.vehicle_id WHERE ScheduleDate >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ScheduleDate ASC;

SELECT Vehicle.make, MaintenanceType.type_name, ServiceSchedule.schedule_date FROM Vehicle JOIN ServiceSchedule ON Vehicle.id = ServiceSchedule.vehicle_id JOIN MaintenanceType ON ServiceSchedule.maintenance_type_id = MaintenanceType.id WHERE MaintenanceType.description LIKE '%oil change%' ORDER BY ServiceSchedule.schedule_date DESC;

SELECT Vehicle.make, Vehicle.model, MaintenanceLog.notes FROM Vehicle JOIN ServiceSchedule ON Vehicle.id = ServiceSchedule.vehicle_id JOIN MaintenanceLog ON ServiceSchedule.id = MaintenanceLog.service_schedule_id WHERE MaintenanceLog.completed = TRUE ORDER BY Vehicle.make, MaintenanceLog.notes DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicle ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT make, model, license_plate FROM Vehicle WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLog ORDER BY service_date ASC;

SELECT service_type, service_cost FROM MaintenanceSchedule JOIN MaintenanceLog ON MaintenanceSchedule.schedule_id = MaintenanceLog.schedule_id WHERE MaintenanceLog.service_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY year DESC;

SELECT Vehicle.make, Vehicle.model, Technician.name FROM Vehicle JOIN MaintenanceSchedule ON Vehicle.vehicle_id = MaintenanceSchedule.vehicle_id JOIN Technician ON MaintenanceSchedule.technician_id = Technician.technician_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT make) AS total_make_count FROM Vehicle;
SELECT schedule_id, scheduled_date, service_type FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE service_type LIKE '%oil%' AND scheduled_date >= '2022-01-01';
